title: Giro d’Italia Women Stage 7: Neve Bradbury Best on Blockhaus, Kopecky Draws Closer to Pink Jersey
content:
Cliffhanger finale Sunday with Lotte Kopecky just one second behind Giro race leader Elisa Longo Borghini.

Read the full article at Giro d’Italia Women Stage 7: Neve Bradbury Best on Blockhaus, Kopecky Draws Closer to Pink Jersey on Velo.
author: sstokes
